There were so many lessons to be learned, from him http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_48pts_vs_Michael_Redd_the_Bucks_04/05_NBA Allen Iverson looked like he might be on his way to another career game when he put up 45 points in the first three quarters against his favorite foils, the Milwaukee Bucks. After a quiet fourth quarter, Allen Iverson settled for 48 points and leading Philadelphia to a 118-111 victory Tuesday night over the Bucks, who have been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star. "Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up, Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. "Except in the last quarter. I guess they felt like they had to do something." By then, it was too late. Allen Iverson

He ran the Downing Street press office in a very professional and straightforward and correct way, and I think he's done some very good work. "But I understand why he wants to go with the things that happened with the News of the World... Obviously he resigned at the time and I've always felt he was punished for the same offence twice. Andy Coulson said continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in his role as Downing Street communications chief. "I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on."
